X.iii.1.D.4.b
.
Restoring the Full Rate for Absences of 30 Days or More
Upon receipt of notice showing that an authorized absence of 30 days or more has been granted to a competent Veteran, take action without awaiting expiration of the 30 days, per
38 CFR 3.556(a)
.
If the award involves Section 306 Pension authorize the full monthly rate, including, if payable, the HB rate or allowance for A&A, effective the date of departure.
Note
:Â  This applies unless it is determined that an apportionment for an estranged spouse should be continued.
